abstract: Chilean lawmakers approve bill giving civil union rights to same-sex and unmarried heterosexual couples.
lead_paragraph: After nearly four years of legislative wrangling, legislators in socially conservative Chile approved civil unions on Wednesday for same-sex and unmarried heterosexual couples
snippet: After nearly four years of legislative wrangling, legislators in socially conservative Chile approved civil unions on Wednesday for same-sex and unmarried heterosexual couples

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Chile: Lawmakers Approve Civil Unions for Gay or Heterosexual Couples
headline.print_headline: Chile: Lawmakers Approve Civil Unions for Gay or Heterosexual Couples
